events.name: Microsoft Cloud & Enterprise Security Management Seminar
events.description: Hi, I'm Steven with the Cloud & Enterprise team at Microsoft Singapore. We would like to invite you and your community to our security seminar on Aug 14, 2017, 0930-1730 at Microsoft Singapore office. The seminar covers some of the best practices for cloud security as well as Microsoft's security strategy for all our offerings. There will be no sale pitch during this event. The purpose of this event are, apart from sharing best practices, to also convince users and customers that security is at the core of any product we build, and is not an after thought. For more information of this security seminar, you can visit https://www.microsoftevents.com/profile/form/index.cfm?PKformID=0x2175805e9a7 If you are joining, please make sure to register at the link provided, otherwise we won't be able to catch your registration. Let me know if you can let your community know about this. Thank you!
events.location: Microsoft Auditorium, One Marina Boulevard, Level 21, 018989, Singapore

events.name: StackUp Clinic: Getting Started with Digital Payments
events.description:
Do you want to start collecting money digitally with your app? Do you wish you could do more than just buy buttons and payment links?
This presentation will introduce you to digital payment solutions, explain how digital payment works, and show examples of how digital payment can augment your app.
The workshop in this session will focus specifically on integrating with PayPal REST APIs using PayPal’s NodeJS SDK (please bring a laptop to follow along). Participants are expected to have prior knowledge of JavaScript and NodeJS.
Agenda

Evolution of Payments
Applications for Digital Payments
How do Payment Gateways Work?
Introduction to the PayPal Developers Sandbox
PayPal REST API Integration Workshop 

MEET THE PEOPLE



Vincent Lau
CTO - Takatack Technologies
Speaker


Vincent Lau is an adjunct lecturer of Stackup who teaches the Fullstack Foundation and Connecting Using APIs courses. He is also the Chief Technology Officer of Takatack Technologies, the digital commerce arm of PLDT (Philippine’s largest telco), as well as the Chairman of the Digital Commerce Interest Group of the Singapore Manufacturing Federation.
Takatack is a channel partner of PayPal, and its TackThis online store builder platform has many payment gateways pre-integrated (e.g. PayPal, PayMaya, AliPay, SmoovPay, Xfers, MOLPay, DragonPay, etc.), which sellers can easily enable at a click of a button.
RESERVING A SEAT

Enter the promotional code that accompanies the invitation email sent to you to reserve a seat.

events.name: Social Coding
events.description: A space for women coders to learn from each other, to practice and discuss learnings with fellow peers. This would be a weekly event of informal space to do coding. So bring your pet projects along or join one of our existing teams/ projects to work on. Featured Projects:https://trello.com/b/kl2BTwil/wwc-sg-social-coding-projects First timers, please read:Newbies Step-by-step Guide Please bring your own laptop. Agenda:6:30p - Registration and Introduce projects7:00p - Break out into groups and Start coding! ^_^8:30p - End session There is no food provided, so please make preparations to grab a bite before you turn up. Also, we recommend to bring your own water bottle along. Psst, this event is intended for ladies only. Host:
events.location: #03-04, IDA Labs@NDC 111 Middle Road, National Design Centre, Singapore 188969., IDA Labs@NDC 111 Middle Road, National Design Centre
